comments.text: Generate a project summary page for Shredder (a.k.a. Self-Serve Data Deletiom) as a page in the [Data Engineering Mana Space](https://mana.mozilla.org/wiki/display/DENG).

comments.raw_text:
The write-up for project Shredder has been completed. It was also reviewed and approved by Daniel and Mark. Content was transferred from Google to Confluence (Mana). Here is the link to Mana:

https://mana.mozilla.org/wiki/display/DATA/Project+Shredder
